stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains the emergence of new cultural and social voices in Europe during the second half of the twentieth century?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the Cold War and contemporary Europe.

choicesHtml: The artistic freedom granted by communist authorities who sought to spread propaganda to the West
The demographic and economic changes that altered the experience of everyday life for women and minorities
The growth of consumerism as a cultural phenomenon in Western Europe
The opportunities created by the creation of transnational political and economic unions such as the European Union
